General.Name: Norstra Energy
General.Description: Norstra Energy, Inc., an exploration stage company, focuses on the exploration and development of oil and gas properties in the United States. The company was formerly known as Norstra Inc. and changed its name to Norstra Energy Inc. in November 2011. Norstra Energy, Inc. was founded in 2010 and is based in Southlake, Texas.
General.Address: 2860 Exchange Boulevard, Southlake, TX, United States, 78041
